title-group.article-title: Correction: Evaluation of Prescription Practices for Antenatal Steroids in Pregnant

p.bold: Correction to: Maternal and Child Health Journal

body.p: The original version of this article contained an error in percentages of chorioamnionitis under Results section. The value should have been 14.7% vs. 10.4% instead of 10.3% vs. 6.8%.
Both incorrect and correct versions of the sentence under Results section is presented here.
Black women had slightly younger infants (avg gestational age 29.5 weeks vs. 30.4 weeks, p < 0.001) and higher rates of chorioamnionitis (10.3% vs. 6.8%, p = 0.04) compared to White women.
Black women had slightly younger infants (avg gestational age 29.5 weeks vs. 30.4 weeks, p < 0.001) and higher rates of chorioamnionitis (14.7% vs. 10.4%, p = 0.04) compared to White women.
The original article has been corrected.

fn.p: The online version of the original article can be found at 10.1007/s10995-025-04070-1.
